author: Atlanta Anthony

review: I received this item just over a week ago and I think it's great.  The main reason I bought this was because of the YouTube app.  I have an older Sony blue-ray player which had a YouTube app but was no longer available after April 20th.  I did not see a need to buy another blue-ray player so I looked at other options.  After reading reviews on this website I just felt the Amazon Fire TV was my best option.  It was very easy to set-up and of course the first app I used was the YouTube app.  The entire process took 15 minutes.  I am using other apps as well.  The apps load very quickly and I have had no issues other then the ESPN app which always takes two attempts to connect.The only negative comment I have is that there is no on/off button for the Fire TV.  It stays on for 30 minutes before shutting down.  I recommend this item very much.
author: jmrk

review: I bought this on sale for $99 for my 40" 3DSamsung TV in my bedroom which is not a Smart TV (it was only $400) and we have the new Samsung 3D Ultra Hi Def Curved TV in our Living Room. I had a Western Digital Live TV Media Player for the Bedroom, but it didn't have the Amazon link. (It has Netflix and Hulu, which is great) and so I figured I'd get the Fire TV which gets just about everything. I wasn't disappointed. It got here in two days and was a breeze to install. It is easy to use, and the voice command feature is a real time saver. It has built in wi-fi (unlike the WD player which I had to buy an antenna for) and so it was really just plug and play. I have had Prime for almost a year, and love it. For about $30 a month I get just about everything, (this includes Amazon, Hulu & Netflix) and so don't have to pay a large cable bill anymore. I highly recommend this product and guarantee that you will love it. It's perfect for those who don't have Smart TV's, for whatever reason. Thanks, Amazon for a year of great service and products, and I hope there will be many more. 1 click shopping is fantastic.

review: We researched the apple tv, roku and amazon fire tv and decided the fire tv would work best for us.  Super easy to set up.  Turns on instantly, navigation is a snap, the voice search is awesome!  The box isn't in the way the remote fits nicely in a drawer.  We have no complaints!
author: Susan T. Elkins

review: I purchased this to help me to reduce my bills and cut Directv. Install was a breeze, and my account info was already installed by Amazon. I bought the Amazon game controller to go with this. It's nice to have everything all in one box as I watch free Prime movies, Netflix, Gaiam, Sling TV. Sling TV doesn't work very well however, I suspect it is not the Fire TV problem, but a bandwidth problem at Sling. All of my other apps work flawlessly. I am not a major gamer, so the games available are ok with me. I enjoy Asphalt 8 a lot.The remote is small and easy to hold. I wish I could get it to work with my Harmony remote, but I can live with one extra remote out on my coffee table.I have the fire stick for my bedroom TV, which works fine as well.
